attributes.action: ban the UK from entering the (Eastern) European Song Sontest in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Come on lets face it we have no hope, we have no neighbours, we are an island, we could send Madonna and still not win!! The only people that vote for us are Ireland and they sent a puppet turkey.  It's completely political not musical. Lets save our TV license money and not bother to enter or air it next year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
